DOC.brief_title: Randomised Controlled Trial Structured Personal Care Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: Type 2 diabetes ( T2DM ) increasingly common illness link considerable excessive mortality . There many indication treatment raise blood pressure blood glucose well dyslipidaemia postpone development diabetic complication . Treatment T2DM primarily do general practice , result satisfactory . The purpose project create basis exist research-based knowledge use improve quality diabetes care general practice . The answer base information 1,428 newly diagnose diabetic patient age 40 follow since 1989 randomised trial among 600 general practitioner . The intervention , end beginning 1996 , provide optimum condition follow-up , doctor-patient communication treatment , among way train doctor , produce clinical guideline set individual treatment goal . In project , general practitioner see coordinator whole health system 's prophylactic effort relation individual diabetic patient . The aim conclude 14-year follow-up : - To investigate long-term effect project model structure , personalize diabetes care 1 ) patient ' mortality development diabetic complication , 2 ) patient ' use service primary secondary sector , 3 ) patient ' self-rated health motivation , 4 ) doctor-patient relationship .
